name: Tabby
short_description: Customizable start page with tabs, bookmarks, weather, and quick links.
description: Tabby is a beautiful, customizable start page for your browser that combines a new tab experience with useful utilities. Features include a tabs interface for organizing your links into categories, weather widget, quick search bar, clock with date, background customization, bookmark management, and keyboard shortcuts. It's designed to be your browser's new tab page - every time you open a new tab, you see your organized bookmarks and quick access to your favorite sites. Uses MariaDB for storing your configuration.
usecases: Set as your browser's new tab page for quick access to bookmarks.
Organize bookmarks into tabs by category (Work, News, Social, etc.).
Quick search from the start page with custom search engines.
Display weather and time at a glance.
